metadata.synopsis: A player has walked to the end of Morphic Pool after killing Gortash without grabbing his stone.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load END_MainGo to Gortash 859; -49; -23Kill himDo not loot him and walk towards the Netherbrain 783; -12; 1634

0.speaker: Player
0.text: We need all three stones before we can face the brain.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: It better be around here somewhere.
